titles.title: Family Retirement Savings Act of 1998
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow certain individuals a credit against income tax for contributions to individual retirement accounts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/3/1998--Introduced. Family Retirement Savings Act of 1998 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a limited credit for contributions to individual retirement accounts.
